Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VKCapabilitiesDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.vulkan.VKCapabilitiesDevice
  • public class VKCapabilitiesDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the capabilities of a Vulkan VkDevice.
